typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> localSource
localSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		empId as string,
		{ name} as string,
		{ gendar} as string,
		{ age} as string,
		{ mail} as string,
		{ phoneNo} as string,
		{ salary} as string,
		{ department} as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
